timeline.bodyText:
When used gives:
Error response from daemon: You cannot remove a running container <containerId>. Stop the container before attempting removal or force remove
where <containerId> is the Id of the running container.
should have before:
docker stop prometheus
timeline.author: rlg-pro

timeline.message:
[OC-1233] Add prometheus monitoring endpoint

Signed-off-by: freddidierRTE <frederic-f.didier@rte-france.com>
